name: Chat Box for Dueling Nexus
description: Chat Box (and other scrolling things) for Dueling Nexus by Skeletonxf and Yubelious! The current chat space takes up a whopping 30% of the entire screen! It is a commonly known bug that, immediately after rps and before the duel starts, if that 30% of the screen is filled entirely by a block of text, the duel will resize and in many cases become unplayable. By containing this chat inside a box, we are able to avert this issue. In all honesty, any old box will do. But I decided to work on a version that feels a little more... Stylish! Or for a low-impact fix with more features, please download my partner's style here: https://userstyles.org/styles/144946/duelingnexus-chat-monster-info-split-view
